game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient scroll from the lost temple.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a hidden temple deep in the jungle, containing an ancient scroll with powerful knowledge. Retrieve the scroll and return it to the village elder.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces and the village elder's gratitude

tasks.description: Navigate through the dense jungle to reach the temple.
Fight off the powerful entity guarding the entrance.
Search for and retrieve the ancient scroll within the temple.
